General.Name: DSR Corp
General.Description: DSR Corporation manufactures and sells wires and wire ropes worldwide. It offers fiber ropes, slings/webbings, wire ropes, and wires for various applications, such as mooring, lifting, fishing, oil and gas, mining, leisure, logging, crane, automotive, general use, electronics, construction, agriculture, and consumer goods. The company was founded in 1940 and is headquartered in Busan, South Korea.
